Package com.ae2dms.Controllers

Class LevelController

java.lang.Object
com.ae2dms.Controllers.LevelController
public class LevelController
extends java.lang.Object

The Class LevelController is the controller class of level.fxml. Initialize the level scene, have a static field that store the selected level, eight mouse event functions.

Since:
1.0
Version:
1.1
Author:
Yixin SHEN
date
2020/11/28-23:49

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initialize the level scene.

      Initialize the level scene, set the properties of fxml elements in the level scene according to the maxLevel value.

      date
      2020/11/29-16:57

    • LoadLevel1

      public void LoadLevel1​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws java.io.IOException
      LoadLevel1, set the scene to game scene.

      Change the selectLevel value to 1, play the interface sound and set the scene to game scene.

      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Mouse click
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - IOException
      date
      2020/11/29-16:59
